Title: Object: La Huída a Egipto (The Flight into Egypt)
Description: The Virgin on a donkey with the Child in her arms; St Joseph standing three-quarter length on the left two angels under a palm tree to right; mountainous landscape with castle in the background Etching
Producer name: Print made by: José del Castillo
Bibliographic references: Páez 1981-85 / Repertorio de Grabados Españoles en la Biblioteca Nacional (462.3)
Prado 1992 / Museo del Prado, catalogo de estampas (100)
